trans-unit.source: Interface definition for creating and deleting Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: 接口定义用于创建和删除 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0 虚拟根。

trans-unit.source: The IComSoapIISVRoot interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot 接口定义用于创建和删除虚拟根目录在 IIS 6.0 中的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot> class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 仅可由实现此接口<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>类，并创建一个 SOAP 启用 COM + 应用程序虚拟根时使用仅在.NET Framework 基础结构内。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot 不需要直接在代码中实现。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>类，该类实现<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>接口包含<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>和<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>由<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>未完全实现</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IComSoapIISVRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: IComSoapIISVRoot 由.NET Framework 在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 不需要在代码中直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 虚拟根。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>接口不需要直接在代码中实现。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), which exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>接口 (由实现<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>类)，这会公开<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 根 Web 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 对应的虚拟根目录的物理路径`PhysicalPath`从<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 名称对应的虚拟根目录`VirtualRoot`从<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可以向其写入一条错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 删除 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 虚拟根。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>接口不需要直接在代码中实现。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface (implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class), exposes a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>接口 (由实现<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>类)，公开<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>方法。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>

trans-unit.source: However, that method is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该方法由不完全实现<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: The root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 根 Web 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟根目录的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟根目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 可以向其写入一条错误消息字符串。
